data.name: CLI_NetworkSettingsHint
data.value: The Bitcoin network to use: main, testnet, or regtest

data.name: CLI_MainNetBackendUriSettingsHint
data.value: The backend server's URL to connect to when the Bitcoin network is Main

data.name: CLI_TestNetBackendUriSettingsHint
data.value: The backend server's URL to connect to when the Bitcoin network is TestNet

data.name: CLI_RegTestBackendUriSettingsHint
data.value: The backend server's URL to connect to when the Bitcoin network is RegTest

data.name: CLI_MainNetCoordinatorUriSettingsHint
data.value: The coordinator server's URL to connect to when the Bitcoin network is Main

data.name: CLI_TestNetCoordinatorUriSettingsHint
data.value: The coordinator server's URL to connect to when the Bitcoin network is TestNet

data.name: CLI_RegTestCoordinatorUriSettingsHint
data.value: The coordinator server's URL to connect to when the Bitcoin network is RegTest

data.name: CLI_UseTorSettingsHint
data.value: All the communications go through the Tor network

data.name: CLI_TorFolderSettingsHint
data.value: Folder where Tor binary is located

data.name: CLI_TorSocksPortSettingsHint
data.value: Tor is started to listen with the specified SOCKS5 port

data.name: CLI_TorControlPortSettingsHint
data.value: Tor is started to listen with the specified control port

data.name: CLI_TorBridgesSettingsHint
data.value: Tor is started with the set of specified bridges

data.name: CLI_TerminateTorOnExitSettingsHint
data.value: Stop the Tor process when Wasabi is closed

data.name: CLI_DownloadNewVersionSettingsHint
data.value: Automatically download any new released version of Wasabi

data.name: CLI_StartLocalBitcoinCoreOnStartupSettingsHint
data.value: Start a local bitcoin node when Wasabi starts

data.name: CLI_StopLocalBitcoinCoreOnShutdownSettingsHint
data.value: Stop the local bitcoin node when Wasabi is closed

data.name: CLI_LocalBitcoinCoreDataDirSettingsHint
data.value: The path of the data directory to be used by the local bitcoin node

data.name: CLI_JsonRpcServerEnabledSettingsHint
data.value: Start the Json RPC Server and accept requests

data.name: CLI_JsonRpcUserSettingsHint
data.value: The user name that is authorized to make requests to the Json RPC server

data.name: CLI_JsonRpcPasswordSettingsHint
data.value: The user password that is authorized to make requests to the Json RPC server

data.name: CLI_RpcOnionEnabledSettingsHint
data.value: Publish the Json RPC Server as a Tor Onion service

data.name: CLI_DustThresholdSettingsHint
data.value: The amount threshold under which coins received from others to already used addresses are considered a dust attack

data.name: CLI_BlockOnlyModeSettingsHint
data.value: Wasabi listens only for blocks and not for transactions

data.name: CLI_LogLevelSettingsHint
data.value: The level of detail in the logs: trace, debug, info, warning, error, or critical

data.name: CLI_LogModesSettingsHint
data.value: The logging modes: console, and file (for multiple values use comma as a separator)

data.name: CLI_EnableGpuSettingsHint
data.value: Use a GPU to render the user interface

data.name: CLI_MaxCoinjoinMiningFeeRateSettingsHint
data.value: Max mining fee rate in sat/vb the client is willing to pay to participate into a round

data.name: CLI_AbsoluteMinInputCountSettingsHint
data.value: Minimum number of inputs the client is willing to accept to participate into a round

data.name: CLI_LanguageSettingsHint
data.value: The display language of all texts in the graphical interface

data.name: Exception_Generic_Friendly
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

data.name: Exception_HttpRequest_Friendly
data.value: Something went wrong. Please try again.

data.name: Exception_UnauthorizedAccess_Friendly
data.value: Wasabi was unable to perform this action due to a lack of permission.

data.value: Could not find the hardware wallet. Make sure it is connected.

data.name: HWI_Error_ActionCanceled
data.value: The transaction was canceled on the device.

data.value: Unknown Error. Make sure the device is connected and isn't busy, then try again.
